main event: Witnesses observed lights hovering in Kenton, Ohio at 10:00 PM on 10 October 1960.
interesting points: The objects appeared as lights the size of a baseball,The observation lasted for approximately 3-5 minutes,The lights moved in a linear fashion before disappearing,The lights were described as brighter than the brightest stars,One witness reported that the object appeared to give off reddish sparks at intervals.
witness description: The witness was at home, about 5 miles from the sighting location.
